thread.title: Longer APS hours a waste of time: Productivity Commission
thread.title_full: Longer APS hours a waste of time: Productivity Commission

title: Longer APS hours a waste of time: Productivity Commission
text:
Longer APS hours a waste of time: Pro... Longer APS hours a waste of time: Productivity Commission 1 hr ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
Canberra mandarins would do better to look to technology for genuine productivity gains delivered through better performance of departments' "core activities", according to the Productivity Commission. Public service bosses asking workers to stay at their desks longer might be wasting their time, according a landmark review of Australia's industrial relations laws. Start the conversation, or Read more at Sydney Morning Herald.
